data.text: My child is happy at Greenwood High School
My child feels safe at Greenwood High School
Greenwood High School does its best to ensure that they reach their potential
My child has SEND (Special Educational Needs and Disabilities), and I believe they are being helped to succeed at Greenwood High School
Greenwood High School has high expectations for all its pupils
There have been a high number of staff changes at Greenwood High School over the last year
My child has the opportunity to explore extracurricular interests at Greenwood High School
Greenwood High School is helping my child to become a successful, rounded person
Greenwood High School takes the need for good behaviour seriously
I am confident that if my child was bullied, Greenwood High School would stop it happening
If I had a concern, Greenwood High School would take it seriously
Greenwood High School updates me regularly about how my child is getting on
Greenwood High School makes me aware of what my child should be able to know and do at this stage
I would recommend Greenwood High School to another parent
